Title: Multiple myeloma
ProbableCases: A 70 year old woman admitted with worsening anemia and pathological fracture of the Humerus had an ESR of 120 mm/hr. Her peripheral smear showed increased Rouleaux formation. X-ray of skull showed multiple punched out osteolytic lesions.
